question: Researchers have discovered a creature, which is claimed to be the world’s longest animal, in which country?
explanation:
Researchers have recently discovered a creature, which is claimed to be the world’s longest animal, in the underwater canyons of Western Australia.
About 30 new marine species have also been discovered in the marine region off the Australian coast. Though the exact length of the siphonophore has not yet been measured, it is estimated that the unidentified flying object (UFO)-shaped creature would be more than 120m long.
